original_title: Afghanistan defeat Sri Lanka by 6 wickets in 1st ODI
original_body_lines: Ibrahim Zadran slammed 98 while Rahmat Shah also scored a half-century to guide Afghanistan to a six-wicket win over Sri Lanka in the first ODI encounter.
Earlier, Charith Asalanka's 91-run knock took Sri Lanka to a respectable score of 268/10 in 50 overs against Afghanistan in the first ODI.
Dhananjaya de Silva had also scored a half-century, putting up a crucial partnership with Asalanka.
Afghanistan captain Rahmanullah Gurbaz won the toss and opted to bowl first.
